name: adsp_tcf_project
description: Main package file for the TCF Project
author: See repository readme

scripts.setup: npm ci && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend/ && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.deploy:backend: docker-compose up --build -d mongodb && cd backend/ && npm run start
scripts.deploy:dev:backend: docker-compose up --build -d mongodb && cd backend/ && npm run dev
